title: Jacksonville woman arrested after 3 dogs found dead in apartment
description: Police say a Jacksonville woman left dogs to starve, leading to the death of three puppies inside her apartment.
content:
A Jacksonville woman is facing several animal cruelty charges after police say they found three dead puppies and a severely malnourished dog inside her apartment.

The Jacksonville Sheriff’s Office says 21-year-old Jada Samone Warren was arrested on August 29 following an investigation that began when Animal Care and Protective Services responded to a possible animal cruelty call at an apartment on LaBelle Street.

Police say they found a strong odor inside the unit, along with a lethargic, malnourished dog and a crate containing three dead puppies.

A fourth puppy was alive but underweight and suffering from hookworms.

Police say Warren admitted she was responsible for the animals but left them unattended for several days.

The surviving dog showed signs of starvation, dehydration, and anemia.

Two of the deceased puppies reportedly tried to survive by eating another that had died, according to JSO.

Warren is facing three counts of aggravated animal cruelty and one count of cruelty to animals.

Investigators noted Warren left the animals without food and water, which directly led to their deaths.

summary: A Jacksonville woman, 21-year-old Jada Samone Warren, is facing several animal cruelty charges after police found three dead puppies and a severely malnourished dog in her apartment. The investigation began when Animal Care and Protective Services responded to a possible animal cruelty call at the apartment. Police found a strong odor and found a crate containing three dead dogs, one of which was underweight and with signs of starvation, dehydration, and anemia. The deceased dog reportedly tried to survive by eating another dead dog.
shortSummary: A 21-year-old woman from Jacksonville was arrested on multiple counts of animal cruelty after three dead puppies were found in her apartment.
argos_summary: A 21‑year‑old Jacksonville woman, Jada Samone Warren, was arrested on August 29 after police discovered three dead puppies and a severely malnourished dog in her apartment. Authorities say she left the animals unattended for several days without food or water, leading to their deaths. Warren faces three counts of aggravated animal cruelty and one count of cruelty to animals.
